game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, players take on the role of a novice mage seeking to restore the arcane arts.
game.ending: The player must defeat the dark sorcerer who has been draining magic from the world and restore balance to the realm.
game.synopsis: The game takes place in the land of Tenoria, where magic once flowed freely but has begun to disappear. Players start as novice mages, tasked with finding a way to revive the magical arts. As they progress through the story, they uncover a dark plot by the sorcerer Malakar to drain all magic from the world, plunging Tenoria into darkness and chaos.
game.title: Lost Magic of Tenoria
